channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Tropic of Cancer with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: Simon rejoins the Tropic in Egypt and follows it through Saudi Arabia, Dubai, and Oman. In Southern Egypt, next to the ancient temple of Abu Simbal, Simon meets Nubians struggling to maintain their culture following the damming of the Nile and dives in the pristine reefs of the Red Sea.
